feature_model.name: DEVICE
feature_model.feature_tree: :r DEVICE (DEVICE) :m JCalc (JCalc) :m FILE (FILE) :m MENU (MENU) :m HELP (HELP) :m LANG (LANG) :o ANALYZER (ANALYZER) :o EDIT (EDIT) :o LOOKANDFEEL (LOOKANDFEEL) :g [1, 1] : GTK (GTK) : Motif (Motif) : Windows (Windows) : System (System) : Metal (Metal) :o SAVE (SAVE) :o COMMA (COMMA) :o PERFORMANCE (PERFORMANCE) :g [1, 1] : EN (EN) : PT_BR (PT_BR) :g [1, 1] : PC (PC) : Milestone (Milestone) : Z6 (Z6)
